definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: My husband looked up and said, 'Mom's here?'
sentences.chinese: 我夫婿昂首看了看，说“母亲来了？”

sentences.english: She and her husband have served in many nations with Sister Gwen Shaw.
sentences.chinese: 她与夫婿跟随石桂林博士在列国中事奉。

sentences.english: Mrs. Smith is a friend of mine, but I don't know her husband from Bdam.
sentences.chinese: 史姑娘夫人是我的伴侣，但我纯粹面生她夫婿。

sentences.english: She was afraid to wake her husband.
Marriageable belle makes public shop of some dress of stone Qi area 4 times to ask for a husband to the society.
sentences.chinese: 石岐区某服饰店妙龄美女四名公开向社会征夫婿一名。

sentences.english: As I look around, I'm tempted to pick out which one should be my husband.
sentences.chinese: 我环顾四周，忍不住想从中选出夫婿。

definition: my husband and master (archaic)/playboy of rich family/pimp
son-in-law (used by wife's family)/uncle (husband of father's sister)
to remarry (of a widow)/second wife/qin and se 琴瑟[qin2 se4], two string instruments as a symbol of marital harmony
